scenario_text.value: Aoi? Aoi, where are you?! Answer meee!
Labramon! Still no sign of Aoi?

No...nothing at all! Oh, Aoi...where could
you have gone?!

(Labramon’s in a panic. She’s incredibly
worried about Aoi...)

It’s gonna be okay, we’re all looking for
her. We’ll find her in no time!

Yeah, you’re right... I’ll turn it up
a notch! We’ll definitely save her!

(Look how desperate she is... We’ve gotta
track down Aoi!)

(Labramon is searching frantically. I’ll try
my luck in another spot!)
